Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{3: 'After returning from the mission with the CUB, the Gray Ravens have all completed their situation reports.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "—And that's the end of our reports. Commandant, are we dismissed?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Of course. Thanks, guys.', 3: '9'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Now that this is done, we should return to help with Asimov's project.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'In that case, Commandant, have a good rest.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As the three of them are about to leave, a familiar voice halts them.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Ayla? Is there something you need from us?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Oh, you're all here as well! That's great.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "We're actually on our way to Asimov to help with his...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Oh, don't mind that. He's busy with something else currently.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Asimov is dropping his research halfway through to work on something else...?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "I bet you wouldn't have guessed that he's helping the WGAA with our Lunar New Year decorations!", 4: '1'}
{2: "No way! We're talking about Asimov, right?", 3: '28'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'What have you done to make him comply...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ayla passes you the beautifully printed paper bag in her hands.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "I think this suits Gray Raven quite well. That's why I was thinking about you guys.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You see two lengthy, red sheets with large, clean calligraphy on them.'}
{2: 'These are "couplets," aren\'t they?', 3: '38'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "I think I've seen it on the surface once... One of the decorations for Lunar New Year.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "That's right. You put them by the two sides of the door.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lee flips through the couplets, examining them.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "What's the point of sticking paper with words next to a door? And what is it that's written on them?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'They are wishes for the new year, written in short and rhythmic, melodic phrases.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'They do feel like poetry and songs.', 3: '49', 4: 'It does sound lovely.', 5: '49'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "I bet they'll sound great if you sing them with music.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "True... If Selena were here, she wouldn't hesitate to perform for us here and now. She would, I'm sure...", 4: '1'}
{3: "Ayla's smile freezes as she thinks about her disappeared teammate.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ayla slightly taps herself on the face, stopping herself from the downward spiral.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Selena must be waiting for us to find her somewhere out there... That's why I won't give up on her.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Of course. Our mission to reclaim Earth is far from over. We must keep going for the coming year.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Liv takes the couplets from Ayla's hands and nods."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Leave this to us—we just need to place them next to a door, right?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Yep! Put them up with some oomph!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'What even qualifies as "oomph"...', 3: '69'}
{3: 'Lucia takes the tools Ayla passes her and smiles.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant, do you remember? This is just like our last mission when we all finished decorating the place together.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Of course I remember. It's just a while ago.", 3: '74'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'I envy you guys—you have so many wonderful adventures!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "...Although, things aren't always that wonderful.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'But as long as we are here with each other, there will be... wonder.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Well, if we're going to decorate Commandant's room, we should start working on it...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'My room?', 3: '83', 4: "Hmm, that'd be nice.", 5: '84'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Of course! Commandant, you're the one who represents Gray Raven.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "I'm glad you like it!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Leave the one on top to me. I'm probably more suited to deal with that height.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "I'll leave it to you, then, Lee...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'We can always count on you, Lee...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Within seconds, the couplets Ayla brought you are now properly placed outside your room.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Hmm—it looks—fantastic!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: '...The calligraphy is beautiful! And the words are... meaningful, it seems.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Right? You couldn't have guessed it, but they are written by Yuan Ye, the CUB from earlier!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "You're saying that the AI system can write couplets? I wish I had opened it up to study when I had the chance...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Another secret?', 3: '108'}
{3: 'Ayla crosses her arms and nods.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Alright! The Gray Ravens have received their couplets, and I'm on my way to give the other squads their own!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Before I go... Happy New Year! Commandant and the Gray Ravens, have a wonderful new year!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'You too, Ayla! Happy New Year!', 3: '113'}
{3: "Hopefully, Ayla's and everyone's wishes... will all come true in the coming year."}
{3: '—Happy New Year!'}
